item.title: Building a local conda package
item.description: The process Create the build files: meta.yaml, build.sh, build.bat. These files could be located inside a conda directory in the same directory as the setup.py file In the meta.yaml file the spurce/path parameter must be set to the relative path of the setup.py file. If working in an environment different than root the location of the created package must be in the colda-bld directory of the environment and conda install may fail because it does not have the appropriate channel.
